name: Reclaim (Duckduckgame)
description:
Stretch outwards from a single seed as you slowly take over the abandoned city. Using a network of Vines, you can collect Sunshine, Water and Nutrients (yum) in order to grow your plants and Reclaim the world.

Made over 6 days as part of the Midsummer Jam 2019, run by Abertay Game Design Society in collaboration with Weave Abertay.

Roles:

Elliot Gray as  Artist

Ythen Sawers as Artist and Sound Designer

Gabriel Kenny as Programmer
